title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Cross-Sectional Anatomy Education Design Through Technology-Enhanced Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cross-sectional anatomical images (CT/MRI) and explain 3D anatomical structures and their relationships.
Learners can appropriately apply radiological anatomical terminology to situational contexts through technology-based collaborative activities.
Learners can effectively acquire complex cross-sectional structures by utilizing learning strategies based on CTML (Cognitive Theory of Multimedia Learning) principles.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
